summary: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.
cast: Anthony Quinn|Giulietta Masina|Richard Basehart|Aldo Silvani|Marcella Rovere|Livia Venturini|Pietro Ceccarelli|Giovanna Galli|Gustavo Giorgi|Yami Kamadeva|Mario Passante|Anna Primula|Goffredo Unger|Nazzareno Zamperla
title: La Strada
